title: PROJECT: A new air-traffic-control tower (ATC)
shortDescription: This project was a new air-traffic-control tower (ATC) for the Darwin International Airport. NTS has been engaged by Lendlease to carry out the external cladding and interior fit out works.
projectDetails:
# PROJECT DETAILS
**CLIENT**: Lendlease
**DESCRIPTION**: Air-traffic-control tower (ATC)
**ADDRESS**: Darwin International Airport
**YEAR**: Apr 2021
